about_the_game:
The Art and World of Wolves on the Westwind not only gives you a closer look at the creation of the visual novel's illustrations, but also provides you with background information on the country and its people. On 132 pages we show you sketches and final images of the characters and locations of Wolves on the Westwind, an overview of the region in which the story is set, as well as background information and game values of the individual characters, so that you can also use them as NPCs in your roleplaying rounds.

The two protagonists of the game have also been given full stats and can be continued as characters of their own. In addition, each setting of Wolves on the Westwind provides plenty of background information for anyone interested. Thus, the book is not only a wonderful extension of the computer game, but also offers newcomers and connoisseurs of The Dark Eye enough opportunities to tie in with the story with their own adventures and dive deeper into the world of Aventuria.
